label: logicA:robotics_en
steps: [1] If R2 has sufficient battery charge, then R2 can power up its motors.
[2] If R2 can power up its motors, then R2 can move.
[3] For every robot x, if x is equipped with a lidar sensor, then x can perform obstacle detection.
[4] R2 is equipped with a lidar sensor.
[6] R2 can power up its motors (from [1] and [5]).
[8] R2 can perform obstacle detection (from [3] and [4]).
[9] R2 can move and can perform obstacle detection (from [7] and [8]).
